publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-359# Shona Robison: Availability of Organ Donor Formsâ€”That the Parliament is concerned that the scheme to include organ donor forms with voter registration forms has been halted; believes that the scheme is a successful way of recruiting badly-needed new donors as demonstrated by Dundee City Council, the only Scottish local authority that took part in the scheme, and considers that the Scottish Executive should enter into discussions with the Electoral Commission and Her Majesty's Government in order to try to resolve any legal difficulties involved in the interpretation of the Representation of the People (Amendment) Regulations 2002.

S2M-359# Availability of Organ Donor Forms (lodged on 17 September 2003) Frances Curran*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Carolyn Leckie*, Kate Maclean*, Eleanor Scott*, Stewart Stevenson*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*, Brian Adam*, Shiona Baird*, Ms Sandra White*, Marlyn Glen*, Mike Pringle*, Murray Tosh*, Michael Matheson*, Robin Harper*

S2M-359# Shona Robison: Availability of Organ Donor Forms-That the Parliament is concerned that the scheme to include organ donor forms with voter registration forms has been halted; believes that the scheme is a successful way of recruiting badly-needed new donors as demonstrated by Dundee City Council, the only Scottish local authority that took part in the scheme, and considers that the Scottish Executive should enter into discussions with the Electoral Commission and Her Majesty's Government in order to try to resolve any legal difficulties involved in the interpretation of the Representation of the People (Amendment) Regulations 2002. Supported by: Frances Curran, Mr Adam Ingram, Carolyn Leckie, Kate Maclean, Eleanor Scott, Stewart Stevenson, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Brian Adam, Shiona Baird, Ms Sandra White, Marlyn Glen, Mike Pringle, Murray Tosh, Michael Matheson, Robin Harper, Alasdair Morgan*, Phil Gallie*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Tommy Sheridan*, Rosie Kane*, Margo MacDonald*
S2M-359# Availability of Organ Donor Forms (lodged on 17 September 2003) Richard Lochhead*, Mr Bruce McFee*, Christine Grahame*, Alex Neil*
S2M-359# Availability of Organ Donor Forms (lodged on 17 September 2003) Scott Barrie*, Fiona Hyslop*
S2M-359# Availability of Organ Donor Forms (lodged on 17 September 2003) Donald Gorrie*, Dr Jean Turner*, Dennis Canavan*
S2M-359# Availability of Organ Donor Forms (lodged on 17 September 2003) John Swinburne*
S2M-359# Availability of Organ Donor Forms (lodged on 17 September 2003) Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-359# Availability of Organ Donor Forms (lodged on 17 September 2003) Elaine Smith*
